entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: N 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
